statements: DELETE FROM ClientInformation WHERE client_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM ClientInformation WHERE id = 1 AND client_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM ClientInformation WHERE email = 'jane.doe@example.com' OR (phone_number = '123-456-7890' AND address = '123 Main St')
DELETE FROM client_notes WHERE client_id = 100 AND note_text LIKE '%important%';
DELETE FROM client_info WHERE client_id = 50 OR client_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM clients WHERE first_name = 'Alice' AND last_name = 'Smith'
DELETE FROM client_files WHERE client_id = '0352c0f2-f347-4334-b9b8-973197b846c9' AND file_type = 'pdf'
